response.overview: The finale (episode 20) of the Channel 5 drama serial "Faculty" was uploaded to Toggle on 30 March 2017. The series depicts the lives of undergraduates in a fictitious tertiary institution named Straits University. In the episode, the character Bryan Cordeiro, played by actor Aaron Mossadeg, appears to come to terms with his being associated with a gay identity, bromance crushes and a lack of attraction to even the most pretty girls. At the end of this clip, he agrees to meet Trevor, a boy who has a crush on him and whom he had blocked on the phone before.
response.title: Gay-suggestive scenes from "Faculty"
